name: Survival of the Stickest
description:
You wake up in the middle of a forest surrounded by giant trees. The only thing that's giving you some sort of safety is a Campfire made out of sticks. You also got a stick as a weapon.
What are you going to fight against? Monsters? Dangerous animals? Murderers?
Nah, just sticks to be honest. Everything else would be too obvious.

Hope you will enjoy my first game and will stick around for my upcoming projects!

Oh and please play it on 1920x1080! Otherwise it could be a bit trash ^^
